name: amyrobson
ParaGraph: Impressive! Though it seems the drag feature could be improved.But overall it looks incredible. You would nailed the design and theresponsiveness at various breakpoints works really well.

name: maxblagun
ParaGraph: Woah, your project looks awesome! How long have you been coding for? Im still new, but think I want to dive into React as well soon. Perhaps you can give me an insight on where I can learn React? Thanks!

name: ramsesmiron
ParaGraph: @maxblagun If youre still new, Id recommend focusing on the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JS before considering React. Its very tempting to jump ahead but lay a solid foundation first.
